front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology - Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems - Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Specific Requirements - Part 19: TV White Space Coexistence Methods

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard specifies radio 1 technology independent methods for coexistence among dissimilar TV Band Devices (TVBDs) and dissimilar or independently operated networks of TVBDs
